thread.title: Bama Blaze: Feel the heat of 2015's post-pep rally homecoming bonfire in Tuscaloosa
thread.title_full: Bama Blaze: Feel the heat of 2015's post-pep rally homecoming bonfire in Tuscaloosa

author: Ben Flanagan | bflanagan@al.com
title: Bama Blaze: Feel the heat of 2015's post-pep rally homecoming bonfire in Tuscaloosa
text:
TUSCALOOSA, Alabama -- The Capstone didn't really need the heat on an already-warm night in Tuscaloosa, but there's no homecoming tradition like the post-pep rally bonfire on the Quad on Friday night. 
Watch the Alabama Homecoming Bonfire 2015 Alabama fans gather around the bonfire following the University of Alabama homecoming pep rally on the Quad in Tuscaloosa on Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. (Ben Flanagan/al.com) The University of Alabama's annual bonfire drew another large crowd on the Quad, as many marveled at another impressive blaze moments after the pep rally concluded.
Following the press conference featuring Nick Saban, Alabama football players, Eli Gold and the Million Dollar Band, Crimson Tide fans moseyed across the Quad as technicians set the stacks of wood ablaze, and the fire burned for the next half hour or so before folks called it a night. 
See photos above, or put yourself there and see if you can feel the heat by watching the video above from Friday's bonfire.
